items.name: Ext.exporter.Base
items.text: This is the base class for an exporter. This class is supposed to be extended to allow data export to various formats. The purpose is to have more exporters that can take the same data and export it to different formats. Exporters are used by Ext.grid.plugin.Exporter and Ext.pivot.plugin.Exporter but could also be used individually when needed.

items.name: author
items.text: The author that generated the file.

items.name: data
showSummary
items.text:
Should group summaries be shown? The data this exporter can consume
may contain group summaries.

items.name: title
items.text: Title displayed above the table. Hidden when empty

items.name: getColumnCount
items.text:
Returns the number of columns available in the provided `columns` array.
It will parse the whole tree structure to count the bottom level columns too.

items.name: saveAs
items.text: Save the file on user's machine using the content generated by this exporter.

items.name: factoryConfig
items.text: If this property is specified by the target class of this mixin its properties are used to configure the created Ext.Factory.
